title: Can we replace the real RISE music video with this work of art?

embed.description: Rise Parody Created by Zettai Absolute - https://twitter.com/ZettaiAbsolute https://www.youtube.com/zettaiabsolute Music: Rise by Riot Games ft. The Glitch Mob, Mako, and The Word Alive https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fB8TyLTD7EE We had the amazing opportunity to partner up with Riot Games and ZettaiAbsolute to make a parody animation of the RISE video for worlds 2018.

body:
This is simply beautiful. 

Mere words cannot describe the amazingness that this is.

Also dat ending.
